products.title: Roma (Fr) Dark Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Pair practicality with style with the roma (fr) in dark blue, where a flame-retardant fabric, ideal for commercial buildings, forms a substantial and contemporary blind with an easy pull-cord mechanism. This distinct blend of fibers creates a crease-free blind with a neat and modern look, and in a gorgeous midnight shade. Match the vibrant and bold dark blue with a complementing and current palette of dove greys, white, and charcoal to form a stylish and modern theme.

products.title: Tiffany Gentle - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever combination of a light cream, gently curved patterning, set on a deeper cream fine fabric background, the tiffany gentle has a pleasing homely feel and will sit subtly amidst almost any colour scheme. The tiffany gentle is a very versatile blind, and is particularly suited to more traditional dcor styles. It can provide a wonderful lightening effect in living rooms or dining rooms where darker woods and furniture might take over, or can provide a touch of modern patterning to a neutral hallway or conservatory without dominating your existing style.

products.title: Bella Blackout Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This tiffany blue vertical blind adds a soft splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sapphire Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This bold bella blackout sapphire blue vertical blind brings cool-toned beautiful blue to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) bluebell couldn't be closer in shade to that of the pretty wildflower itself. This pretty yet simple blind is made from durable, wipe-clean fabric, and has all of the features of its sister blackout blinds. Use in the kitchen amidst cream walls and delicate florals for a spring-like feel and all of the cheer that comes with it, or add it to lilacs and pinks in a child's room, using it to lift out the colours in coordinating patterns.

products.title: Premium Tropical Blue Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
products.description: Doesnt tropical blue describe this blind absolutely perfectly? One glance at this venetian will have you dreaming of clear skies, pure waters and a life of relaxation. No wonder its such a fashionable shade. We can see this blind alongside metallics like rose gold or copper a doesnt tropical blue describe this blind absolutely perfectly? One glance at this venetian will have you dreaming of clear skies, pure waters and a life of relaxation.

products.title: Essence Teal Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
products.description: An aquatic hue mixing blue and green, the essence teal blind is a smart and sophisticated choice if you want to add a little colour to your home. Its a shade that can obviously be matched with other cool, relaxing hues, perhaps in your bathroom or bedroom, and also goes surpr an aquatic hue mixing blue and green, the essence teal blind is a smart and sophisticated choice if you want to add a little colour to your home.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Cosmic Blue Roller Blind
products.description: This dark blue navy is so very chic, reserved and gorgeous. Perfect for grown-up spaces as well as bathrooms and little boys rooms this blackout roller blind will look sensational wherever its hung. The cordoba blackout fabric has a high quality finish with superb light this dark blue navy is so very chic, reserved and gorgeous.

products.title: Tiffany Flawless - Roller Blind
products.description: The tiffany flawless is an elegant and refined blind. A light, breezy fabric layered with a natural contoured pattern, the flawless looks simply stunning as it delicately shimmers in the light. Use the timeless off-white of the flawless to accentuate darker neutrals in a home office or dining room, or pair with pretty peaches and medium woods to add a touch of sophistication and class to an open kitchen diner.

products.title: Tiffany Smoulder - Roller Blind
products.description: A blind offering a light and classy fabric, the tiffany smoulder is a modern take on the colour charcoal, with three gently contrasting tones and a beautiful pattern. The combination of natural-shaped patterning and the fine texture of the cloth allows this blind to flow effortlessly when lowered. The subtle variations in tone on this blind make the smoulder well-suited to both darker themed rooms, like traditional country cottage kitchens with dark wood features, and light and airy living rooms and dining rooms.

products.title: Tiffany Chrome - Roller Blind
products.description: An on-trend portfolio of natural greys and a free-flowing pattern combine harmoniously to create tiffany chrome. The way in which the threads shimmer under the light gives it the name, and the way in which it refines any contemporary space gives it the reputation. Match with deep sandy browns and hints of natural green for a simple triple colour offering that instantly makes you feel at home. For an added touch of inspiration you could add some simple minimalist wall art to the home office so that you can get truly creative when the time comes.

products.title: Tiffany Imagine - Roller Blind
products.description: Dare to imagine the ideal blend of natural beige, soothing creams, and a naturally flowing raised patterning, and you have the tiffany imagine, the calming influence you have been looking for. The imagine will work wonderfully amongst contrasting dark woods in a neutral living or sitting room, or in a luxurious bedroom full of browns, creams, and golds. Or place in a guest bedroom or hallway where the distinctive tiffany patterning can add a touch of neutral style with little effort.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: For an eye-catching window display, feature the vivid roma (fr) in azure. Made from sturdy, flame-retardant material, perfect for commercial use, this is a modern blind with a simple rolling mechanism for easy functionality. Blend the vibrant azure with bursts of lime green, dove grey, and duck egg blue to form a current palette of summer brights. Stick to a soothing white or ivory base for a clean and contemporary look, adding heaps of character and contrast by intertwining the selected tones with botanic prints and compelling textures.

products.title: Tiffany Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever and enchanting blend of different tones of cream, the tiffany dove is a light, classy blind whose patterning provides a distinctive and eye-catching feature for any window in your home. Place in the bedroom to provide a light and airy feel, and a natural colour against other dcor, or perhaps add to the bathroom, where the dove will offer balance and airiness when set against bolder colours that need toning down.

products.title: Kerry Blush Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The light blush blue of this vertical blind is perfect for adding a lighter, bright colour to your windows. Pairing in beautifully with soft pastel or neutral tones, this fabric is also blackout so will stop all light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Kerry Azure Roller Blind
products.description: A beautiful shade of royal blue, the kerry azure is a great accessory to any room. Paired with whites, neutrals or grey it works as a bold statement of colour, whereas combined with other blues or even browns it creates a homely and comforting space. Combined with its blackout properties, you will be totally sheltered from curious eyes and direct sunlight. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Paradise Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Combining the colour of unblemished sapphires and the soft resilience of its polyester fabric, this blind is undeniably the greatest thing ever invented by man. No joke. Being such a rich colour with so much personality, that this blind will make your home better in every regard is a given. The only danger to ordering this blind is that houseguests may or may not try to steal it, but if they are willing to endanger your friendship for a window blind, then they arent worth it honey.

products.title: Kerry Oxford Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Elegant, regal and just a little bit dangerous, like a tiger in a tuxedo, the kerry oxford blue is great at adding a block of solid block of rich yet understated character to your room. Paired with lighter neutrals or even stark whites, the versatility of this blind is second only to its raw charisma. Completely blackout, it adds a layer of extra functionality that makes it suitable for a number of environments, most notably the bedroom, where privacy and darkness are paramount.

products.title: Kerry Muted Aqua Roller Blind
products.description: You cant go wrong with this gorgeous pastel blue that adds a soft dash of colour to any room without demanding too much attention. Perfect for spaces filled with white, grey or neutral colours that need a gentle accent, this blind will be right at home from the get go. With a thick blackout lining it keeps all the sun out too, making it perfect for bedrooms and other spaces that need their darkness and privacy.

products.title: Gibson Sky Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The light, sky blue colour is airy and gentle. Pair this with lighter decors or with rooms that have a blue theme to them. Additionally, it is suitable for damp conditions, easy to clean and is also fire retardant. This roller blind is very versatile and can be installed in kitchens, bathrooms, living rooms and bedrooms - brilliant. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Navy Roller Blind
products.description: The dark gibson navy is the darkest blue colour in the range. Bordering on a purple colour, this fabric is great for anyone looking for a deep blue coloured roller blind. The durability of this blind means that it can be installed in bathrooms without fear of water damaging it. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Sapphire Roller Blind
products.description: The lighter blue in the gibson sapphire is rich and bright. This is a great sky blue colour and is perfect for bathrooms or matching in with blue decors. The colour will not fade and being moisture resistant means it can be installed in bathrooms - guaranteed to add a splash of colour. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Gibson Azure Roller Blind
products.description: The royal tone in the gibson azure is a more refined, deeper colour. This is great for rooms that already have blue in them or need some darker colours added in. This is a very durable fabric that can be used in kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms. The gibson range is full of bright and bold colours. The fabric is very versatile, it is suitable for damp conditions, easy to clean and is also fire retardant.

products.title: Orient Faux Silk Teal Roman Blind
products.description: Their orient faux-silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This teal faux-silk roman blind, introduces a saturated, green/blueshade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds.
